title: [K-12] Foundations of Data-Driven Learning Analytics: Customized Instructional Design for Secondary Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Understanding of Social Studies Foundational Concepts
context.additional_context: A foundational competency enhancement program in learning analytics for undergraduate students, designed for application in secondary education settings. Combines online platform-based data collection/analysis activities with face-to-face workshops.

learning_goals: Systematically collect and visualize learning activity data.
Interpret data on learning engagement and achievement to design personalized feedback.
Apply data-driven instructional design principles to social studies lessons.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
